Articles.Content:
New astronaut candidate class for 2013:

http://www.space.com/22454-new-nasa-astronauts-eight-balls.html

I was in Navy Officer Candidate School with one of these guys (Victor Glover) in 2000 and saw him again when I was doing bridge watches on USS Enterprise and he was training to be an F-18 pilot. Small world.
Very cool Who knows, maybe one day you'll announce your bud is going to fly Orion capsule to an asteroid?

... and saw him again when I was doing bridge watches on USS Enterprise.

So may we call you Ensign Crusher?

So may we call you Ensign Crusher?

<grin> I was actually amazed at how little Star Trek fandom touched my time on the Enterprise. There was, if I recall correctly, a signed poster from the Next Generation cast outside the CO's office, which he would occasionally grumble about, but that's about it.
